title: Eric Dane Diagnosed With ALS, Will Resume Filming Euphoria Next Week
description: Eric Dane, whose many TV credits include Grey’s Anatomy, The Last Ship and Euphoria, has been diagnosed with ALS (amyotrophic lateral sclerosis aka Lou Gehrig’s disease). “I am grateful to have my loving family by my side as we navigate this next chapter,” the actor said in a statement to People.com, sharing his diagnosis. Dane […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Ghosts’ Román Zaragoza Talks Sasappis’ Love Triangle Twist and Why He Pitched for Sas to Be a Virgin
description: Turns out the woman that Sasappis wants is actually right in front of him. During Thursday’s Ghosts, Sas went ahead with his potentially deadly plan to get to Shiki by going in the ghost trap, even though crossing the Woodstone property in the box could smush him to death. While he thought he was still […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Thrilling or Overkill? 9-1-1 Season 8 Episode 14 Unleashes a Contagion
description: The 118 is called to a fire at a lab during 9-1-1 Season 8 Episode 14, and our review discusses a dangerous turn as they're trapped inside. The post Thrilling or Overkill? 9-1-1 Season 8 Episode 14 Unleashes a Contagion appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: The Librarians Was Always a Hit. The Next Chapter Returns Home.
